Class CSSBundleTag

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder

    public class CSSBundleTag
extends AbstractResourceBundleTag
    Facelets taglib which uses a CSSHTMLBundleLinkRenderer to render links for CSS bundles.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
